title: Health Education
banerDescription: Develop your competencies in health promotion, prevention, and health education to inspire others to lead a healthy lifestyle.
description:
• Individuals interested in public health and health education
  • Teachers wishing to expand their didactic and substantive competencies
  • Specialists involved in health promotion and disease prevention
description2: The aim of the studies is to provide knowledge and skills necessary to conduct educational activities in the field of health and prevention. Participants gain solid foundations in areas such as health psychology, public health, sexual education, and shaping a healthy lifestyle.
description3: The program is based on theoretical and practical classes conducted by experienced lecturers and specialists. The classes enable the acquisition of both knowledge and practical skills necessary in the work of a health educator.
description4: Our studies offer the opportunity for professional development and gaining qualifications to conduct activities in the field of health education and health promotion. Graduates are prepared to work in various environments, inspiring others to lead a healthy lifestyle.

topics.title: Psychology, Sociology, and Pedagogy of Health
Basics of Human Anatomy and Physiology
Epidemiology of Infectious and Non-infectious Diseases
Social Diseases, Civilization Diseases, and Social Pathologies
Food and Nutrition with Elements of Psychodietetics
Shaping a Healthy Lifestyle in Various Environments
Methods and Forms of Physical Activity and Movement Recreation
Health Education in the Core Curriculum of General Education and Various Subjects
Methodology of Conducting Health Education Classes

faculty: Classes are conducted by experienced specialists in the fields of public health, health psychology, and education.
practices:
• Pedagogical practice enables gaining experience in health education.
  • Internships take place in schools and institutions related to health promotion.
evaluation: Assessment of learning outcomes includes activity during classes, completion of modules, implementation of internships, and preparation of a diploma thesis.
jobOpportunities:
Graduates of the program will be prepared to work as:

  • Health educators in educational and medical institutions
  • Health promotion specialists
  • Consultants in the field of health education
  • Employees of institutions dealing with public health
  • Creators of educational programs and teaching materials
invite: Inspire others to lead a healthy lifestyle and develop your competencies through our postgraduate studies in health education.
